title: Beijing Olympics, NFL Coaching Controversy, The Color Purple Remake, Buffalo Wild Wings and more.
itunes:title: Beijing Olympics, NFL Coaching Controversy, The Color Purple Remake, Buffalo Wild Wings and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! What is your Valentine playlist? The CLO has some situations to deal with for sure. Big Dog makes a good point with regards to Joe Rogan. Fantasia and Taraji P. are among the big names that will be in The Color Purple Remake. Our boy James is going through it and he said some things that he probably should have kept to himself. Steve and Junior can't help but tell the truth about the NFL Coaching controversy. Buffalo Wild Wings got the special of specials. Would You Rather revolved around aging. Big Dog gives us an update from Beijing. Today we wrap up the show with Steve and some Q&A.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
